results.title: Direct activation of endothelial cells by SARS-CoV-2 nucleocapsid protein is blocked by Simvastatin
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the study provides insights on @SPECIES_2697049 @@@SARS-CoV-2@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Livedoid_Vasculopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000090122 @@@vasculopathy@@@ and @DISEASE_Blood_Coagulation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001778 @@@coagulopathy@@@, and suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, an FDA-approved @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering drug, may benefit to prevent the pathogenesis and improve the outcome of @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin initiated early after heart transplantation: 8-year prospective experience.
results.text_hl: The incidence of transplant @<m>DISEASE_Livedoid_Vasculopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000090122 @@@vasculopathy@@@ confirmed by angiography was 24.4% in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group versus 54.7% in the control group (P<0.02 by log rank).

citations.NLM: Wenke K, Meiser B, Thiery J, Nagel D, von Scheidt W, Krobot K, Steinbeck G, Seidel D, Reichart B. Simvastatin initiated early after heart transplantation: 8-year prospective experience. Circulation. 2003 Jan 7;107(1):93-7. PMID: 12515749

results.title: Simvastatin restored vascular reactivity, endothelial function and reduced string vessel pathology in a mouse model of cerebrovascular disease.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Livedoid_Vasculopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000090122 @@@vasculopathy@@@ with @DISEASE_Impotence_Vasculogenic @DISEASE_MESH:D018783 @@@arteriogenic@@@ remodeling and string vessel pathology in TGF @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
